short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modern Note Taking Extension which lets you organize your notes into pages, update, delete and save notes as pdf

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notezy allows you to 
- Create notes
- Organize notes into pages 
- Update note 
- Delete note
- Highlight a specific note for quick reference
- Wait, it doesn't stop there, you can also download your notes locally as a pdf file. 

Notezy uses your local storage to store your notes, hence giving you a complete control over your data and keeps your data secured. Notezy's User Interface is minimal yet modern, and it guarentees to give you the best experience possible. Also, it comes with a variety of color themes. More updates coming soon!

Add Notezy Now!

Version 0.0.4:
- Renewed "Search Note" field.
- Pick up where you left! Drafts are saved automatically.
